title: Roughness in Love
description: (What is the punishment for betrayed? What is the punishment of fell in love with friend? Pain Past – Angela and Elathan both were very good friends at collage time. Angela love Elathan But she know it's just a dream because Elathan never love Angela. But things change when an incident happened and both of them separated. Things changed. One side Elathan suffer in pain and on the other side Angela hide a secret. After many years past when they found each other everything changed between them. Elathan a cruel, handsome, merciless, heartless mafia king and a monster who wants live like a king on mafia world. Angela hot, beautiful, brave girl whose heart always like an Angel. Elathan want his revenge from Angela at all cost and he punished Angela for his relief. He cross all his line. Chasing his big dream he lost  his big dream. Angela What happened when he find out the biggest truth about Angela for betrayed Elathan? Whose going to surrender at the end? Angela Or Elathan)
author: Missi Angel
